FAQS.FirstQuestion: What is the warranty period for your products?
FAQS.FirstAnswer: Our products are covered by a 2-year warranty from the date of purchase. The warranty period may vary depending on the type of product.
FAQS.SecondQuestion: How can I track my order?
FAQS.SecondAnswer: You can track your order using the tracking number sent to you on the shipping company's website. You can also check the status of your order from your user panel.
FAQS.ThirtyQuestion: How can I return or exchange a product?
FAQS.ThirtyAnswer: You can return or exchange your products within 14 days from the date of receipt. For return or exchange processes, you need to contact customer service.
FAQS.FourthAnswer: Shipping fees vary based on the weight of your order and your delivery address. For detailed information, please visit our shipping fees page.
FAQS.FiftyQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
FAQS.FiftyAnswer: You can make payments using credit cards, debit cards, cash on delivery, and bank transfers. For more information, please check our payment methods page.

Dashboard.ProductCategoriesChartInfo: These charts show the number of products in each category and the average rating each category receives from users on ShopCO. By analyzing product distribution and customer satisfaction by category, you can make strategic decisions.
Dashboard.NumberOfComment: Number of comments made by users
Dashboard.NOCByUser: Number of comments made by the user
Dashboard.NumberOfUsers: Number of members in this age range:
Dashboard.UsersChartInfo: These charts show the number of comments each user has made and the number of registered users in each age range on ShopCO. By analyzing user comments and user distribution by age range, you can better understand user engagement and demographic information.
Dashboard.OrdersChartInfo: This chart shows the total number of orders and the total quantity of products in those orders for each day on ShopCO. By analyzing order trends and product distribution, you can better understand sales performance.
Dashboard.ProductsChartInfo: This chart provides detailed information on the sales of each product on ShopCO. It displays the quantity sold, price per unit, and the name of each product, allowing for a comprehensive analysis of product performance.
